content: i m sure everyone has their own idea of the perfect vanilla sock - well this is mine after much trial and error i think this has the ideal mix of toes heels and cuffs i hope you ll agree **updated on 22nd june 2016** the pattern has been updated and now includes multiple sizes and a photo tutorial for the short row heel as well as having been generally polished up around the edges to take account of feedback since the original publication i hope you like the revisions **sizes - measured around midfoot** * **small** - 6 5 /16 5cm unstretched 8 /20 25cm stretched * **medium** - 8 /20 25cm unstretched 10 /25 5cm stretched * **large** - 9 /22 75cm unstretched 11 /28cm stretched i d love it if you d come to my group 1 to show off your lovely socks or chat about them while you re making them you d be very welcome 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/jo-torr-designs
